General.Name: Saudi Airlines Catering Company
General.Description: Saudi Airlines Catering Company offers catering and other support services to flights operated by Saudi Arabian and other airlines in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through three segments: Inflight, Retail, and Catering and Facilities. It offers in-flight catering services; and manages airport lounges. The company also provides SkySales, an in-flight shopping service; catering, accommodation management, laundry, and cleaning services to companies in remote sites; and on-platform and onboard catering services for passengers in rail terminals. In addition, it offers catering services to private sector firms and government offices, as well as hospitals and clinics; commercial laundry services to airlines, hotels, industrial operations, hospitals, and other clients; Hajj and Umrah catering services; and security services. Saudi Airlines Catering Company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: A1 Saeb A1 Jamari Street, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, 21413
